ing: 1/2 cup Hellmann'sÂ® or Best FoodsÂ® Real Mayonnaise
4 (5 ounce) boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
4 teaspoons Italian seasoned dry bread crumbs
des: "The simplest and most savory way to dress up chicken breasts for a quick supper is just to top them with mayonnaise, sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and bread crumbs, and bake. Dinner will be ready in 30 minutes or less."
ins:
Preheat oven to 425 degrees F.
Combine Hellmann's(R) or Best Foods(R) Real Mayonnaise with cheese in medium bowl.
Arrange chicken on baking sheet. Evenly top with mayonnaise mixture, then sprinkle with bread crumbs.
Bake 20 minutes or until chicken is thoroughly cooked.
